flags.name: -e
flags.description: Treat the given string as Ruby source.

flags.name: --allowed-extension
flags.description: Specify file extensions Sorbet should discover.

flags.name: --autocorrect
flags.description: Apply safe autocorrects to source files.

flags.name: --autogen-behavior-allowed-in-rbi-files-paths
flags.description: Allow RBI files in these paths to be treated as behavior-defining.

flags.name: --autogen-msgpack-skip-reference-metadata
flags.description: Skip serializing extra reference metadata in msgpack autogen output.

flags.name: --autogen-subclasses-ignore
flags.description: Ignore patterns only for autogen-subclasses.

flags.name: --autogen-subclasses-parent
flags.description: Parent class for which to generate a subclass list.

flags.name: --autogen-version
flags.description: Autogen version to output.

flags.name: --cache-dir
flags.description: Directory used to cache Sorbet data.

flags.name: --check-out-of-order-constant-references
flags.description: Detect constants referenced before they are defined.

flags.name: --color
flags.description: Control whether Sorbet uses color output.

flags.name: --counter
flags.description: Print the specified internal counter.

flags.name: --counters
flags.description: Print all internal counters.

flags.name: --dir
flags.description: Typecheck all Ruby and RBI files under the given directory.

flags.name: --e-rbi
flags.description: Treat the given string as RBI source.

flags.name: --enable-all-beta-lsp-features
flags.description: Enable early-access, expected-stable LSP features.

flags.name: --enable-all-experimental-lsp-features
flags.description: Enable all experimental LSP features (may be unstable).

flags.name: --enable-experimental-lsp-document-formatting-rubyfmt
flags.description: Enable experimental LSP document formatting via Rubyfmt.

flags.name: --enable-experimental-lsp-document-highlight
flags.description: Enable experimental LSP document highlight.

flags.name: --enable-experimental-lsp-extract-to-variable
flags.description: Enable experimental LSP Extract To Variable.

flags.name: --enable-experimental-lsp-signature-help
flags.description: Enable experimental LSP signature help.

flags.name: --enable-experimental-package-directed
flags.description: Enable package-directed checking instead of whole-program mode.

flags.name: --enable-experimental-rbs-assertions
flags.description: Enable experimental support for RBS assertions in comments.

flags.name: --enable-experimental-rbs-comments
flags.description: Enable experimental RBS signatures and assertions in comments.

flags.name: --enable-experimental-rbs-signatures
flags.description: Enable experimental support for RBS signatures in comments.

flags.name: --enable-experimental-requires-ancestor
flags.description: Enable experimental `requires_ancestor` annotation.

flags.name: --enable-experimental-rspec
flags.description: Enable experimental RSpec support (best effort only).

flags.name: --error-url-base
flags.description: Prefix used to build links for error codes.

flags.name: --experimental-ruby3-keyword-args
flags.description: Enforce Ruby 3-style keyword arguments (experimental).

flags.name: --file
flags.description: Typecheck the contents of the given file.

flags.name: --gen-packages
flags.description: Generate package information.

flags.name: --ignore
flags.description: Ignore files whose paths match the given pattern.

flags.name: --isolate-error-code
flags.description: Report only the specified error code(s).

flags.name: --max-cache-size-bytes
flags.description: Maximum LMDB cache size in bytes.

flags.name: --max-threads
flags.description: Set number of worker threads.

flags.name: --metrics-branch
flags.description: Set the branch reported in metrics.

flags.name: --metrics-extra-tags
flags.description: Add extra tags to all StatsD metrics.

flags.name: --metrics-file
flags.description: Write counters and timers to a JSON file.

flags.name: --metrics-prefix
flags.description: Prefix applied to all metrics.

flags.name: --metrics-repo
flags.description: Set the repo field in metrics output.

flags.name: --metrics-sha
flags.description: Set the SHA field in metrics output.

flags.name: --minimize-to-rbi
flags.description: Output a minimal RBI diff against the given file.

flags.name: --no-config
flags.description: Do not load the sorbet/config file.

flags.name: --no-error-count
flags.description: Do not print the final error count summary.

flags.name: --no-error-sections
flags.description: Print only the first line of each error message.

flags.name: --no-stdlib
flags.description: Do not load Sorbet's standard library RBI payload.

flags.name: --package-skip-rbi-export-enforcement
flags.description: Directories whose RBI constants may be exported.

flags.name: --packager-layers
flags.description: Define valid package layer names and enable layering checks.

flags.name: --parser
flags.description: Select the parser implementation.

flags.name: --progress
flags.description: Draw a progress bar.

flags.name: --quiet
flags.description: Silence all non-critical errors.

flags.name: --remove-path-prefix
flags.description: Remove the given prefix from printed paths.

flags.name: --reserve-class-table-capacity
flags.description: Preallocate class and module table slots.

flags.name: --reserve-constant-name-table-capacity
flags.description: Preallocate constant name table slots.

flags.name: --reserve-field-table-capacity
flags.description: Preallocate field table slots.

flags.name: --reserve-method-table-capacity
flags.description: Preallocate method table slots.

flags.name: --reserve-type-argument-table-capacity
flags.description: Preallocate type argument table slots.

flags.name: --reserve-type-member-table-capacity
flags.description: Preallocate type member table slots.

flags.name: --reserve-unique-name-table-capacity
flags.description: Preallocate unique name table slots.

flags.name: --reserve-utf8-name-table-capacity
flags.description: Preallocate UTF8 name table slots.

flags.name: --rubyfmt-path
flags.description: Path to the rubyfmt executable.

flags.name: --sorbet-packages
flags.description: Enable Sorbet's experimental Ruby package system.

flags.name: --sorbet-packages-hint-message
flags.description: Optional hint message added to package-related errors.

flags.name: --statsd-host
flags.description: Hostname of the StatsD server.

flags.name: --statsd-port
flags.description: Port of the StatsD server.

flags.name: --statsd-prefix
flags.description: Prefix applied to all StatsD metrics.

flags.name: --stop-after
flags.description: Stop after the specified compiler phase.

flags.name: --store-state
flags.description: Store state into symbol, name, and file table files.

flags.name: --stripe-packages
flags.description: Enable Sorbet's experimental Ruby package system.

flags.name: --stripe-packages-hint-message
flags.description: Optional hint message added to package-related errors.

flags.name: --suggest-typed
flags.description: Autocorrect files to the highest valid `# typed:` level.

flags.name: --suggest-unsafe
flags.description: Include unsafe autocorrects; optionally wrap with a custom method.

flags.name: --suppress-error-code
flags.description: Suppress the specified error code(s).

flags.name: --suppress-payload-superclass-redefinition-for
flags.description: Suppress superclass redefinition errors for the given class.

flags.name: --track-untyped
flags.description: Track untyped usages in file-table output.

flags.name: --typed
flags.description: Force all code to the specified strictness level.

flags.name: --typed-override
flags.description: Override strictness for specific files via YAML.

flags.name: --typed-super
flags.description: Enable typechecking of `super` calls.

flags.name: --uniquely-defined-behavior
flags.description: Require each class or module to define behavior in one file.

flags.name: --verbose
flags.description: Set verbosity level.
